AuthLocationAccessSchedule.name: AuthLocationAccessSchedule
AuthLocationAccessSchedule.description: Represents the operating hours during a specified period in which authorization is valid for a place.

AuthEndDate.description: End date of the authorization period.

AuthStartDate.description: Start date of the authorization period.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the authorization location access schedule.

OwnerId.description: ID of the authorization location access schedule record owner.

WorkDay.description: Days during which the authorization is valid.
